parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bill scenario to update.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the updated bill scenario.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The updated name of the bill scenario.

nested_items.name: billInterval
nested_items.description: The time period covered by the updated bill scenario.

nested_items.name: start
nested_items.description: The start date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: end
nested_items.description: The end date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the updated bill scenario.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the bill scenario was originally created.

nested_items.name: expiresAt
nested_items.description: The updated expiration timestamp for the bill scenario.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: An error message if the bill scenario update failed.
